message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30.  It's best to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at your share.
I think we can do better. I'm willing to give you 40, but I need to get at least 60 to make it worthwhile.
Bob, time is running out!  My offer is now $65 for me and $35 for you.  Another round and your share will shrink again.
I'm sticking with my previous offer. I can't afford to go lower with inflation.  This is my final offer.
